name: growth_aggregated_data
doc: Census PEP population growth estimates by type for Franklin and Delaware counties.

fields.name: Year
fields.doc: Reference year for estimated variable. Specific reference date may vary. See process documentation more details.

fields.name: ChangeType
fields.doc: Type of population change, either 'NatGrowth' or 'Migration'

fields.name: PopChange
fields.doc: Change in population that can be attributed to either migration or natural growth.
